api/BOOSE_Paint.AppCanvas.html.title: Class AppCanvas | BOOSE_Paint_Docs
api/BOOSE_Paint.AppCanvas.html.summary: Class AppCanvas Namespace BOOSE_Paint Assembly BOOSE_Paint.dll Class AppCanvas contains methods for drawing custom graphics public class AppCanvas : ICanvas Inheritance object AppCanvas Implements ICanvas Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Constructors AppCanvas(int, int, Form, Label[], Button[], TextBox[]) Initialisation method for creating a new AppCanvas public AppCanvas(int xSize, int ySize, Form form, Label[] arrLbl, Button[] arrBtn, TextBox[] arrTxt) Parameters xSize int canvas width ySize int canvas height form Form parent form arrLbl Label[] array of labels arrBtn Button[] array of buttons arrTxt TextBox[] Properties BgColour Stores the background colour public Color BgColour { get; set; } Property Value Color PenColour Stores current pen colour and handles changes public object PenColour { get; set; } Property Value object Xdiff Difference in width between the form and the canvas public int Xdiff { get; set; } Property Value int Xpos Cursor X position public int Xpos { get; set; } Property Value int Ydiff Difference in height between the form and the canvas public int Ydiff { get; set; } Property Value int Ypos Cursor Y position public int Ypos { get; set; } Property Value int Methods Circle(int, bool) Draws a circle with a given radius at the pen position public void Circle(int radius, bool filled) Parameters radius int circle radius filled bool whether the circle should be filled Clear() Clears the entire canvas using the background colour public void Clear() DrawTo(int, int) Draws a line from the pen position to the given position, leaving the pen at the end of the drawn line public void DrawTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int line destination X position y int line destination Y position MoveTo(int, int) Moves the pen position to the given position public void MoveTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int destination X y int destination Y PostOutput(string) Posts a message to the user into the output text box public void PostOutput(string output) Parameters output string output message Rect(int, int, bool) Draws a rectangle of a given size at the pen position public void Rect(int width, int height, bool filled) Parameters width int rectangle width height int rectangle height filled bool whether the rectangle should be filled Reset() Clears the canvas and sets the variables to their defaults public void Reset() Resize(int, int) Resizes the bitmap to a given size public void Resize(int width, int height) Parameters width int new canvas width height int new canvas height Set(int, int) Sets the size of the canvas public void Set(int width, int height) Parameters width int new canvas width height int new canvas height SetColour(int, int, int) Sets the colour of the pen to a given RGB value public void SetColour(int red, int green, int blue) Parameters red int RGB red value green int RGB green value blue int RGB blue value Tri(int, int) Draws a triangle of a given size at the pen position public void Tri(int width, int height) Parameters width int triangle width height int triangle height WriteText(string) Draws text onto the canvas at the pen position public void WriteText(string text) Parameters text string text string to be drawn getBitmap() Returns the current canvas bitmap public object getBitmap() Returns object current canvas bitmap

api/BOOSE_Paint.html.summary: Namespace BOOSE_Paint Classes AppCanvas Class AppCanvas contains methods for drawing custom graphics AppCircle Replacement command for drawing a circle AppClear Replacement command for clearing the canvas AppFillCircle Replacement command for drawing a circle AppFillRect Replacement command for drawing a filled rectangle AppInt Replacement command for handling integer variables AppMoveTo Replacement command for moving the pen position AppReal AppRect Replacement command for drawing a rectangle Form1 Main program form
